item.description:
CPAC, the Conservative Political Action Conference meets in DC, Feb 10 - 12. Some of us will arrive on Feb 9.

The Opposition is busing hoards of voters to water down our vote this year!! We need more supporters for Ron!

http://www.youtube.co...

Remember that Ron Paul won the straw poll there last year with 31% of the vote. There's nothing like voting for Ron Paul and watching him win!

This is the conservative event of the year. With a show of strength, we influence opinion to change America towards the way you want it.

You can be there too.

Go to www.CampaignforLiberty.com and purchase discount tickets, with options for lodging.

Jim Azzola
item.name: CPAC 2011 - Meet Ron Paul and Gary Johnson!
